info: The grant will assist the Government implement the Program. Specifically, it will help the Government (i) strengthen the legal framework, (ii) remove market distortions, (iii) disengage the Government from commercial activities, (iv) strengthen financial intermediation, and (v) implement accounting and auditing standards. The grant will also develop and establish training programs in these areas to help sustain private sector and financial market development over the long term.
name: SUPPORTING PRIVATE SECTOR & FINANCIAL MARKET REFOR
